### Description
When participating in kintsugi testnet, besu logs a lot of finalization errors, e.g.:
```
2022-02-04 19:20:05.826+00:00 | vert.x-worker-thread-0 | INFO  | EngineForkchoiceUpdated | Consensus fork-choice-update: head: 0x05bcb69071b9cb8ec4b72c5d0e270797b2c1e7bfac47e425d2d16708ab3413eb, 
2022-02-04 13:19:51.644+00:00 | vert.x-worker-thread-0 | WARN  | MergeUnfinalizedValidationRule | BlockHeader failed validation due to block number already finalized
2022-02-04 13:19:53.464+00:00 | vert.x-worker-thread-0 | WARN  | MergeUnfinalizedValidationRule | BlockHeader failed validation due to block number already finalized
2022-02-04 13:19:53.943+00:00 | vert.x-worker-thread-0 | WARN  | MergeUnfinalizedValidationRule | BlockHeader failed validation due to block number already finalized
2022-02-04 13:19:55.770+00:00 | vert.x-worker-thread-0 | WARN  | MergeUnfinalizedValidationRule | BlockHeader failed validation due to block number already finalized
2022-02-04 13:19:56.847+00:00 | vert.x-worker-thread-0 | WARN  | MergeUnfinalizedValidationRule | BlockHeader failed validation due to block number already finalized
```

These could be legitimate errors due to fuzzing, but the log does not provide enough detail.  Sometimes these errors are coincide with the consensus client stalling and/or dropping peers.

### Acceptance Criteria
* log block number and hash and finalized block number and hash when we encounter this error

### Steps to Reproduce (Bug)
1. participate in kintsugi with current builds of teku and besu

**Frequency:** [What percentage of the time does it occur?]
Infrequent, not predictable

### Versions (Add all that apply)
* Software version: 22.2.MERGE-SNAPSHOT
* Java version: [`java -version`]
* OS Name & Version: [`cat /etc/*release`]
* Kernel Version: [`uname -a`]
* Virtual Machine software & version: [`vmware -v`]
* Docker Version: [`docker version`]
* Cloud VM, type, size: [Amazon Web Services I3-large]
